caption: The photograph presents a somber scene at a cemetery. A group of men dressed in black suits is seen in the process of carrying a blue coffin from a black hearse parked on a grassy area. The setting is serene, marked by the presence of various tombstones and bright flowering plants, with mature trees displaying autumn colors in the background. The light filters through the trees, casting soft shadows on the grass, adding to the tranquil yet mournful atmosphere of the setting. The overall composition of the image captures a moment of communal respect and grief during a funeral, amidst a peaceful natural surrounding.
title: Funeral at Rifle
